Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit a game-winning grand slam in the bottom of the 8th inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets have an uphill battle in the National League wild-card race

The Mets were five outs away from taking three of four from the red-hot Padres in San Diego, and they were four outs away from taking the first two of this series against the equally hot Diamondbacks on the road
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Severino was hit by a line drive in the third inning and had to limp around the mound
Others: Edwin Díaz walked the first two batters in the bottom of the 8th inning
The Mets bullpen pieced together three hitless innings to get the ball to Díaz
